column2:
"OK, let's start with my wish...
Actually, there's something I want to buy in Tokyo."
"But I dunno how long I'll be able to fight with this Phantom body, so I'm kinda worried..."
"So, if you've got some time, could you take me to look around Tokyo?"
"I'll feel a lot safer if I'm with you, and I can pick up what I'm looking for between missions."
"This is my Partner Card. Give me a call when you're heading for Tokyo? OK, see you then!"
